   <div ng-cloak ng-show="(machines | filter:machineIsManageable).length == 0">
  }}
  h2. Machine Buckets

Machine Buckets are ultra fast virtual machines, running at enterprise level SSD speeds, delivering a very high IO performance. Machine Buckets are delivered with a complete toolset of powerful functions that provide control and flexibility: start, stop, clone, snapshot, rollback, export and monitor machines.

Machine Buckets are delivered with a basic package of CPU, Memory and Storage. Bandwidth is unlimited as long as fair use applies. You can add to your basic package additional primary storage and archive/backup storage.

h3. Start now and create your Machine Bucket

{{html:
</div>
}}

{{html:
  
<div id="tabbable">
  <h1 ng-cloak ng-show="(machines | filter:machineIsManageable).length > 0">Machine Buckets</h1>
  <form class="form-horizontal" method="get" action="MachineBuckets#/new">
    <fieldset>

    <!-- Button -->
    <div class="control-group">
      <div class="">
        <button id="singlebutton" name="singlebutton" class="btn btn-info btn-large ">Create Machine Bucket</button>
      </div>
    </div>

    </fieldset>
  </form> 


  <table id="machine_buckets_list"  class="table table-striped table-bordered" ng-cloak ng-show="(machines | filter:machineIsManageable).length > 0">
    <tr>
      <th>Status</th>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th style="display: none">IP Address</th>
      <th>Memory</th>
      <th>CPU</th>
      <th>Storage</th>
    </tr>
    <tbody>
      <tr ng-repeat="machine in machines | filter:machineIsManageable">
        <td>{[machine.status]}</td>
        <td>
          <a ng-href="#/edit/{[machine.id]}" title="{[machine.description]}">{[machine.name]}</a>
        </td>
        <td style="display: none">{[machine.ip]}</td>
        <td>{[numeral(machineinfo[machine.id].size.memory * 1024 * 1024).format('0 b')]}</td>
        <td>{[machineinfo[machine.id].size.vcpus]} <ng-pluralize count="machineinfo[machine.id].size.vcpus" when="{'one': 'core', 'other': 'cores'}"></ng-pluralize></td>
        <td>{[numeral(machineinfo[machine.id].storage * 1024 * 1024 * 1024).format('0 b')]}</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>
}}
